intro: Alocasia flabellifera, commonly known as the Chinese Evergreen, is a tropical plant native to Southeast Asia. It is characterized by its large, heart-shaped leaves that can grow up to 1 meter in length. The leaves are typically a deep green with a distinctive, glossy surface. This plant thrives in humid, shaded environments and requires well-draining soil. It is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively low maintenance requirements.
